mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN member AS M ON A.memberId = M.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM article WHERE displayStatus = 1 AND boardId=#{id}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR body LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, displayStatus = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET delStatus = 1, delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
